name: Glasya Tiefling
description: Glasya, the daughter of Asmodeus and the lord of Malbolge, grants her tiefling offspring a subtle, beguiling nature.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Hellish Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

traits.name: Legacy of Malbolge
traits.description: You know the Minor Illusion cantrip. At 3rd level, you can cast Disguise Self once. At 5th level, you can cast Invisibility once. You must finish a long rest to cast these spells again with this trait.
